title: Why are Apple products so cheap in Dubai as compared to India in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: In India, you’re paying about 30% of that MRP of iPhone in taxes. (GST and import duty) You don’t have any kind of import duty for electronics in UAE and sales tax or whatever their equivalent of GST is, is around 5%. (Read some time ago, don’t know if it’s changed) So obviously it’s going to be cheaper.
